title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 800.31 - Penalties for violation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 800.31 - Penalties for violation

State Regulations
(a) It
shall be unlawful for any person, firm or corporation to utilize or make use of
any wharf, dock, landing or other utility operated by the Port Commission
without paying to said commission the proper toll charge or fee therefor as
fixed by the commission. (b) It
shall be unlawful for any person, firm or corporation to fail, refuse or
neglect to comply with any of the provisions of the rules and regulations
prescribed herein, and a violation of any of the provisions of these rules and
regulations shall be subject to the penalties in such case made and
provided. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
800.31

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
